Installation¶

SET is still in its early stages of development and does not yet offer a double-click installer. As a result, running the program requires you to setup the development environment, which can be tricky for those not familiar with programming in the command line. We’ve tried to be as descriptive as possible in our installation guide for our users. If you have any questions or trouble installing, feel free to ask for help from the support page and describe your issue to us.

Windows¶

  1. Download Python Anaconda 2.7
  2. Download Git Bash
  3. Open a terminal, navigate to the directory you would like to contain the files for the Toolbox git clone <insert link to SkyglowGithubhere>
  4. Run (need to double check that this is right)
    conda create env geospatial.yml
  5. Run
    python Itest.py
